author: wsjcom
title: Keep Money-Market Funds Safe and Sensible
text:
Your editorial “The Next Money-Fund Bailout” (Jan. 29) omits key facts about my legislation as well as the effects of the SEC’s 2014 rule affecting money-market funds. I agree that investors should be aware of the risks of their investments and that the federal government should not bail out failing businesses. That’s why my bill prohibits federal bailouts and requires that this be disclosed on page one of an investment prospectus.
The first postcrisis reform, which occurred in 2010, brought increased transparency, liquidity...
